titleInfo.title: 'File 10/24 Telegraphic and Radio Charges incurred by BAPCO'

physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order. There is an index (folio 6). The index is arranged chronologically and refers to documents within the file.

The foliation sequence is written in pencil, in the top right corner of each folio. The numbering begins on the front cover, on number 1, and then it carries on until 8, which is the last number given on the back cover of the file.

mods.abstract: The file contains letters sent by Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO) asking for a reduction of the rates for telegraphic and radio transmissions.There is an index (folio 6).
